column1: * 2003 - The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers wins two Oscars
* 2006 - The Lord of the Rings Musical opens in Toronto.
** Borondir is on his way in search of the Éothéod.
** Gandalf arrives in Mirkwood and begins the questioning of Gollum.
**  They pass out of Ithilien. Aragorn dismisses the faint-hearted.
